website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight wired headphone that works well to block out the outside world.
pros: Wired design, with a detachable cable for easy storage
Available in a variety of colors and styles
Comes with an inline mic and remote
cons: Reports that individual channels (left or right) fail within a few weeks

customer_reviews.title: Lower priced beats alternative.
customer_reviews.text: These are good looking headphones with a contemporary Appearance. I liked the color scheme, designed to look good while being worn. They provide significant ambient noise isolation. They have a musical sound, not transparent in terms of sound reproduction but more of a “beats“ type of sound; fat, warm and bottom heavy. I would say these headphones are a direct competitor of beats in terms of appearance and sound quality at a much lower price. Five star are given because I couldn’t think of a reason to take any stars away.
customer_reviews.author: akakpaws

customer_reviews.title: ... a little less than 8 months and they feel great still. I love the removable cord because sometimes ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I've had this product for a little less than 8 months and they feel great still. I love the removable cord because sometimes I just don't feel like taking the headphones off but the cord gets caught. And as an artist, these have withstood just about every messy thing from clay, plaint, glue, etc... so they're very easy to clean for me. I've always loved skullcandy and these don't disappoint, although they're not really studio headphones as I'd hoped. But I do get complaints about how loud they are occasionally
customer_reviews.author: A.G

customer_reviews.title: Blown away by their sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Now, my review is by no means a professional one and I am in no way an audio professional, but these headphones sound great! I do have a hearing issue (tinnitus, mine sounds like a call of duty 4 flashbang screech all the time) so I know my hearing is not the best, but these headphones sound awesome for their price range. Specifically, the bass.. The bass is not too heavy or powerful, but I feel just right. The mids are very alive and the highs are sharp. Overall, these are great headphones at a great price. Try them, they last me all day without head/ear fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: They sound great, they are light weight and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the skullcandy grind on-ear headphones after trying several over-the-ear and reading several on-line tech review sites. They sound great, they are light weight and very comfortable. I would definitely recommend these to friends and family. I was very surprised by the quality of the sound at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, inxpensive headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for 3.5 year and have yet to have a problem with them; they sound great and are really comfortable. It's usually dark in the room when I use them, so I don't look real closely at them, but recently I did notice the ear pads are starting to show some wear. I'm considering replacing them with a new pair of Skull Candy headphones, but only because I want Bluetooth and/or noise canceling headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Hultman, II

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Quality - Unbeatable Price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in almost every way. They have amazing sound quality and are fairly comfortable. Treated with care, I expect these headphones to last at least six to twelve months without breaking. Just be careful not to drop them. However, I should note that the headphones do become minorly uncomfortable after a period of time. In addition, they are not sound-proof. Compared to my previous headphones, I've noticed people are able to hear noise from only two feet away at a moderate volume. This is the perfect cheap headphones to purchase, but I do recommend saving up for something that offers greater quality and experience.
customer_reviews.author: ObitoSigma

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very good for the price. And I love the style, too.... several people asked me if I was a DJ or musician b/c they thought these headphones looked that cool.I've had 'em for about a year, now, and they still sound and look great. It also works well for phone calls. I don't know where the speaker is, but with my phone in my pocket, the people on the other end of the call say they can still hear me very clearly.
customer_reviews.author: bej

customer_reviews.title: (Unexpectedly) Great headphones, Lightweight with great value
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones, extremely lightweight construction and cheap with decent quality, just what i was looking for, something that would be comfortable to wear in a hot and humid country that i won't be afraid to throw into my bag. I wanted something i can hear audiobooks and podcasts on for hours without my brain frying, and also music when i'm programming, they do amazingly, my 400$ Sennheiser's cook my brain after a while and i have to take them off, these work wonderfully. I'm not sure if it's just me, but i was expecting these to be headless, Skullcandy please check the Amazon page and make sure it's not misleading, it sure was when i bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Martin M.

customer_reviews.title: the sound is amazing on the Grinds
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, the sound is amazing on the Grinds. Deep bass, excellent mids and highs. The microphone works great. With all of that being said, the construction is on the light side, exposed wiring to the ear cups, plastic cups, and a metal band. For me, this is no issue but I would be concerned if these headphones were to be frequently used in a commute or put into a bag. If something snags that wiring, it's going to rip out. For my use, that is not a concern, just a heads-up.
customer_reviews.author: Nize

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound for way less $$ than the popular stuff
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the $60. They fit great, feel great on my ears, sound incredible. I compared them to Sennheiser and Beats, items my friends recently purchased so we had a comparison session and I'm totally satisfied with these headphones. The ONLY downfall is no protective case since they don't fold up for shoving in a bag for portability. I use these with a FiiO x1 DAP and am very satisfied with the interface, the sound quality, etc. And these are superior in clarity of sound vs my Sony Noise Cancelling headphones.
customer_reviews.author: J. More

customer_reviews.title: Huge cable issue
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good for the price. You can still hear some background noise from your surroundings when listening. The major downside is the cable, it didn't bring any instructions on how to use the headphones and cable. Therefore, not sure if I'm simply using the cable wrong or if it's the wrong cable, but the sound keeps going back forth between the phone and headphones and and they keep stopping and playing whatever I'm watching without me pressing the button which sometimes doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Dignora Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who can’t wear earbuds (they just fall out of my ears, regardless of what size “plug” I use), I was searching for a good set of over-ear headphones that wasn’t going to cost a fortune. I have tried Skullcandy brands before and loved them, so I got a set of these headphones at a Radio Shack when they were going out of business. I loved these headphones and used them so much that I had to find a replacement. Thankfully, I was able to find another set through Amazon, and I’m loving them just as much as before!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Seehusen

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Detatchable Cord, Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Edit: After about a year, the headphone foam cover started to deteriorate & the whole left earphone foam part eventually fell off. Still great sound though. Love them - great sound, super comfy. I actually am quite happy with the detachable cord - I had to buy new headphones because my cat chewed on the cord of my Skullcandy Lowrider headphones that I'd had for 4 years - so I can replace the cord without buying new headphones should she do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Design is comfortable and sound was not equal to my V-Moda but ...
customer_reviews.text: I confess that I bought it because of the color. I didn’t have high expectations. Bought it as backup pair because my V-Moda M-80 was packed away. Pleasantly surprised at the quality and sound. Design is comfortable and sound was not equal to my V-Moda but given what I paid (thirty dollars), I was stunned at how good they sounded. Been recommending these to friends who don’t want to pay V-Moda prices for headphones.
customer_reviews.author: leizl

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works even better
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, comfortable, somewhat noise cancelling, with great sound for a lower cost headphone. My son is very happy with them for listening to music, audiobooks, and gaming. The built in mic works very well, and the on ear controls allow for pausing, resuming, and managing calls easily.
customer_reviews.author: shelby koning

customer_reviews.title: Music sounds like it's in a big opera hall or something.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones so I'd have a comfortable experience listening to music, but I WILL be returning them. Sound quality was horrible, and the music sounded as if I was in some large opera hall like they have in Europe! They are quite comfortable, but with inferior sound they're not worth having. Period! I will instead get the Flips Audio headphones. Again the comfort factor was wonderful, but the sound was like being in a concert hall or inside a big boat.
customer_reviews.author: JJ dreamer

customer_reviews.title: These are cool. AND, they're ORANGE!
customer_reviews.text: I can now die happy knowing I own a pair of ORANGE headphones! I mean, geez, talk about making it big here. I am one happy glamper. The sound quality is nice too, and the ear cushions are much more comfortable than the beartrap-like death grip of my old $20 Sony's. Man those things sucked.
customer_reviews.author: Fats DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Better than Beats and for the price just buy them!
customer_reviews.text: I received these on sale for an awesome price vs the other colors. I'm guessing this wasn't a popular color but I didn't care. These fit very nicely and the ear cups are super soft and comfortable. I have been wearing them for a few hours at my work desk and no discomfort at all. Are these my B&W at home? No, however for the price I don't think I've heard any this nice. Beats the pants off those Beats junk........
customer_reviews.author: JCB

customer_reviews.title: I love these! They are super comfortable and I wear ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are super comfortable and I wear them while working out. The cord is awesome, you can unplug it from the headphones if you don't like them but it is wrapped in some kind of material so the cord doesn't stick to itself and get tangled. There is also a button on one of the headphones so you can pause your music without looking at your device.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie W.

customer_reviews.title: Hands down best headset!
customer_reviews.text: This headset is so amazing I can't even begin! I have been through so many headsets not knowing what i trully wanted. I used mostly over the ear ones as to block most sound out and to have the best quality of sound. but these fit so snug on my head and didn't push hard on my ears, which was another fear I had. Because I don't want to have ear pain with them being pushed down. The sound is amazing and I can use it with almost everything I own!! The built in mic is such a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Audible Books passion
customer_reviews.text: My much older - and simpler styled - Skullcandy headphones died after long use, so I knew I wanted to go with Skullcandy again. And besides - cool name! I really like these. They are very comfortable and improved over my old style headphones. Great sound quality for my Audible books and music. I like the detachable cord (the part that gave out on the older model). I hope Skullcandy keeps making headphones with cords as not everyone can use the cordless model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the price. You are buying up.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. I'm pretty tough on my "to-go" items, throwing them in purses and backpacks. This was a perfect purchase. I bought for my kids, too. My fourteen years old always has them around his neck, if not in and he absolutely loves them, in fact he takes better care of these than he has his last pairs. My 19 year old Navy HM/ College student was more than pleasantly surprised when he took his out for a run. We also like the colors, able to match with our styles.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: If you find them buy them
customer_reviews.text: Again not noise canceling headphones. They are simply the best, absolutely the best headphones for the money you can buy! With features of headphones that cost twice the price. Such as replaceable cord, leather cushioned ear pads and more
customer_reviews.author: John Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good mid-tier headphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent casual use headphones! Probably not the best for audiophiles, but sounds are clear and the quality is good. I’ve bought these a few times now, they usually last about a year of daily rough use before I need buy a new pair. For the $30 price point, I think that’s very reasonable!
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Good durable headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use as all purpose headphones. - Seem to be pretty well made. - Sound is good for the price. - Only negative is that they’re a little small for my big head and the padding on the headband is not that soft. Not the most comfortable headphones I own (-1 Star)
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: good headphones, trash cord.
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are great for the price, however the wire/cord gave out about 4 months in and it's mostly mono, I can sometimes spin it just right to get stereo sound for a few minutes before I bump it out of place. As a former DJ I would say the line to line cord is trash, regardless of its tough exterior.
customer_reviews.author: Foster Beazy

customer_reviews.title: s'ok
customer_reviews.text: They provide good sound but are very finicky about placement. The earphones press on your ears after a while and will slip if the band isn't snug enough, but don't set the band too snug or it will press on your noggin. It may take a few wears to get your setup right. I really like the taptech for pausing/playing, very handy.
customer_reviews.author: nicole.maie

customer_reviews.title: Buy them! (But, be careful of the cord)
customer_reviews.text: They are super comfortable and super stylish. I love these! I agonized over which pair to purchase but, I'm so glad I went with these. They are well worth $30 and actually cost $59.99 on the Skullcandy website. The sound quality is good and they fit well. Buy them... You'll love them! The removable cord is a plus, too! Update: I've used these maybe 5 times... The cord is already cutting out. I'm very unhappy about that. I really love these headphones but, now that the cord is cutting out... They're pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: A. Love

customer_reviews.title: Sit very comfortably on ears and sound amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I had mild expectations of these headphones since I usually stick to in ear audio. I have had a couple over the ear headphones and they always make one of ears hurt if I wear the too long. Not these. They are extremely comfortable and they sound amazing. I am glad I gave these a chance. I am no audiophile but I would recommend these to everybody.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bustos

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Sounds are very crisp and clear. Bass not over the top but just about right unless you are a bass head. Lightweight plastic probably prone to easy breakage. Just don't throw them around. Worth the money but no more.
customer_reviews.author: Texstechfan

customer_reviews.title: Muddled and low mids and no bass
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was more than lacking so I returned. I like the fit but there was no bass and the middles were really muddled. In fact, I intended to use for working out so my standards are a bit less than normal listening but these didn't even cut it with those lowered standards.
customer_reviews.author: 2Nirvana

customer_reviews.title: Great for the buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the buy. These are on-ear headphones, not over-ear headphones so it’s expected for some ambient noise to come through. However, the padding on the ears is dense enough to block a lot out. They’re also pretty comfortable. I have no complaints with these headphones other than since the wire is cloth-based, when it brushes up against something like yourself or a table, you can hear it run against the object. Other than that, these are worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I don't really like that the wire is wrapped so tightly it retains it's shape, and because of the fabric surrounding the cord it kinks a little, but other than that have had them for years and haven't had any trouble very good headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are nice headphones for the price I paid, they look good and its sound is very decent, bass and mids are clear and phone calls work perfectly. The only issue I found is comfort. After half an hour your ears hurt a bit, you need to adjust the band. The earpads should be articulated so they fit better in your head. Apart from that, I'm satistied for a 25 dollar headphones with phone support.
customer_reviews.author: Lulo

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly acceptable headset
customer_reviews.text: Some manufacturers who produce headphones like this are not mixing the sound quality . You have to adjust your Windows equalizer or purchase the software on your own. Once I understood this I got the base I was after., Plug in mini plug to headset appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Spolar

customer_reviews.title: Great for my father in law
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my father in law and he loves them. The old fashioned/plaid style print really appeals to him. He has some mobility issues and hand coordination issues and these are easy for him to use. We ended up getting the pink ones for my mother in law
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: sound quality
customer_reviews.text: At first I was going to send these back because everything I plugged it into had sound issues. Finally I plugged them into my sound bar, and the sound is very good for a moderately priced headphone. They are comfortable for long time use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Left side stopped working after being used for 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Arrived later than originally stated. Was a gift for my son. He loved them at first but after 2 weeks the left side stopped working. Tried to get them replaced but seller would not accomadate my request since it was past 30 days since I purchased them. Very unsatified with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Labelle

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted us a litle while
customer_reviews.text: I think my kids only were able to use this for their laptops for school for like a week. It was a major waste of money. I think it would be okay if they were adults, but doesn't hold up to children well.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected at this price range
customer_reviews.text: Honestly these are better than expected. Wanted midrange ote headphones, so ordered these. Sound quality is great and very much better than expected at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Guy "Gibby" Wolgamott

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em
customer_reviews.text: My wife absconded with my other skullcandy headphones, so I purchases these and they are GREAT! Good sound, but I wasn't able to get the buttons to do anything useful.
customer_reviews.author: johncblacker

customer_reviews.title: I love my headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love my headphones. The sound is crisp and soothing to the ear. It has a great sound canceling effect. The ear pads are very comfortable and I can use them for long hours. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: NOT Bluetooth enabled
customer_reviews.text: These were the first item shown when I searched for ‘wireless Bluetooth ’ headphones...I even checked the video on them and it showed a bike-rider wearing them, no cord! When they came and had this ugly blue cord and they weren’t wireless...well, it was super disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Dga120

customer_reviews.title: Durable, dependable
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable sound, not deep bass, comfortable wide metal band, cord can be unplugged from headphone, and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Saha

customer_reviews.title: really like them
customer_reviews.text: I'm at my computer when I use these so I really don't need bluetooth. Excellent base and treble. Not disappointed at all - which one can easily be with head phones.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Alan Behr

customer_reviews.title: Love'em
customer_reviews.text: These rock we bought 3 pair for everyone in the house and they work great, I had no idea that the phone calls would sound so clear.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D

customer_reviews.title: They're good and comfy, but fall apart after about a year
customer_reviews.text: I've owned two of these headphones and both of them fell apart after just about a year (~10-13 months). The plush part that sits on top of your ears came off (I taped them back on). I'm okay with this at $40 since I absolutely do want a pair of headphones that's both on-ear and has a metal headband, which seems to be an expensive rarity nowadays, but it's up to you.
customer_reviews.author: Zowayix

customer_reviews.title: I really like the button on the headphones
customer_reviews.text: Cute and fashionable. These are my second pair of headphones from Skullcandy. The others might have been Hesh. This pair is a bit tight on the ears and does indeed cause headaches when worn for extended periods of time. I wore them for a doctor's visit when I broke my earbuds and had a major headache. I really like the button on the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: My 15 year old loves it! She never takes ...
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old loves it! She never takes them off! Her younger sister likes these more than the pair i got her (the Skullcandy Uproar III)
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: My experience is that they are excellent. Sound is well defined
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a pair of headphones for work, old ones finally broke. I had read the reviews and was familiar with the brand. My experience is that they are excellent. Sound is well defined, a little heavy in the bass but not overly done. I find them very comfortable, I wear them 5-6 hours a day. I am no audiophile, but I think for the money this is one of the better headphones out there in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Smith

customer_reviews.title: It is Okay for quality but not for the price!
customer_reviews.text: To be very fair, this unit is as good as a generic one at its one-third price. At medium volume level a nearby person can hear. Quality is OK but I cannot justify the price. I am keeping it just because a return would cost me money for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Rashed Anwar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: My son has autism and is very particular about comfort and sound quality. He absolutely loves these, and I would order this item again.
customer_reviews.author: SKazzy82

customer_reviews.title: so this will be like a review from the average customer
customer_reviews.text: Well, first off I am no audiophile, so this will be like a review from the average customer. I have enjoyed skullcandy headphones for a while and I bought these to replace my Hesh 2's that broke. I was happy with the price and color (since purple is my favorite) and decided to get them. I have had them for a little over 4 months now and I think they are awesome. They are comfortable when wearing for a few hours back to back, and I love the sound, possibly more than the Hesh 2's I had. Overall, they feel solid, sound solid, and are great headphones for under 50$.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Hudson

customer_reviews.title: NOT WIRELESS
customer_reviews.text: Do Not let the pictures without wires trick you into thinking these are the NEW bluetooth / wireless headphones you are probably looking for. These are wired with removable wire. NOT WIRELESS
customer_reviews.author: BZ

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for $32.99 which I thought seemed fair. They do work pretty well, bass and noise cancellation is decent, considering the size. They sound clear which is awesome but the mids and highs do get a little distorted if you have them pretty high. The fit was a bit tight, but to be fair I have a big head. They're pretty light and the pads are soft but I started feeling uncomfortable about 15-20 mintues, wearing glasses made it little worst. All in all its a decent product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are okay
customer_reviews.text: In general these headphones are good. But...the base isn't that good. If you have it as loud as it can go everyone can also hear the words clear as day. So thats a big downside too. As far as the comments about them hurting your ears, I haven't really noticed it that much.
customer_reviews.author: falina

customer_reviews.title: Kids like them, they work well
customer_reviews.text: purchased these based on favorable review in consumer's report. Kids like them, they work well, good price, better sound isolation than the cheap ones they were using, while not being overly large for them (9 and 11 year olds)
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, great sound. I find myself keeping them on at work even if I don’t have any sound on because they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: WebGirlie

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but they aren't as comfortable as he hoped
customer_reviews.text: Purchased by my son. Great sound but they aren't as comfortable as he hoped. Next pair will be over ear.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Not wireless
customer_reviews.text: It was listed with other colors that were wireless. I picked the gold because it was a few dollars cheaper. When I used them I realized they are NOT wireless.
customer_reviews.author: toubob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones for the price, everything i can ask for in a pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Got for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Got for the kids. Started with Puro bluetooth because they got good reviews but they were basically junk. Both pairs broke within the week terrible product. Got these because they were wired so kids could shift easily between devices when they are fighting over who is using what. Awesome. very comfortable, sound great, look really cool. Perfect product i would highly recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: MikeB

customer_reviews.title: it's a great set that offers pretty decent sound and it's comfort ...
customer_reviews.text: it's a great set that offers pretty decent sound and it's comfort is also good. I use them especially for trips and around the house with my ipad. Highly recommend as an inexpensive set of headphones that provide very good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C. Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES these. The sound quality was a huge upgrade from what she was using. The only drawback is that these are very noise canceling (more so than her other ones) and so she very rarely can hear us with these on.
customer_reviews.author: NickJG

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality, but they don't cost as much as ...
customer_reviews.text: Stylish headphones. Not the best quality, but they don't cost as much as the best quality either. It has builtin mic and also the cable is removable which means I dont have to throw these out when they get a short in the cable. you get an extra star for that
customer_reviews.author: Odis Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Love using these...but 2 drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of music. I am not a huge fan of the fact that they make my head so hot when I work out. They also don't feel ultra secure while running. I have a similar pair made by another brand that are a little tighter. None the less for the price they are pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: These things work exceptionally well and preventing sounds of Ryan's Toy Review, Axle and Daddy Show, Suprise Eggs, etc., from leaving my son's ears while he watches his tablet!
customer_reviews.author: ckleinfeld

customer_reviews.title: I WILL BUY AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: MY second pair. fit nice sounds great. After 5 months still good and great for mixing I had Marley could find anything like it I'm getting another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Caudill

customer_reviews.title: great product, was purchased for my niece as a ...
customer_reviews.text: great product, was purchased for my niece as a Christmas gift, she is 9 years old and uses them pretty often. She obsoletely loves them. Love the size, which is nice for a child, she love the color which is true to the all the pictures. she loves the sound, it isn't too low and can be very loud when you set it loud.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful appearance but...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately they didn't work once my son opened his package. I have to send them back to skullcandy to receive a new one . But they are very nice to look at . Can't wait till the new ones come to try them out properly.
customer_reviews.author: Imani Green

customer_reviews.title: the sound is nice, it has good highs and mids
customer_reviews.text: the sound is nice, it has good highs and mids, not a deep bass but it's pretty clear, the grip is a bit tight and the band on top is a bit too hard. I have a bose on ear headphones, and although it doesn't compare in comfort, I prefer the sound of these.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute which is honestly the main reason I got them. The sound leaves a lot to be desired. They are just very quiet. And the ear cushions start to hurt after about an hour of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: List 1 foam..to tight for the head
customer_reviews.text: Lost 1 side or ear foam..it is to tight on the head if you will were it for a long time..the sound is good..but the overall experience I would buy something else
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: High quality and have lasted longer than any other pair of headphones that I own.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hill

customer_reviews.title: Review after one comute
customer_reviews.text: Good fit on my not so small head. Comfortable (used for 30-40 minutes). Sound emphasizes bass though not much. Visually they are a beautiful set. No bag included, they do not fold, not a problem for me. Will update when I use them for a longer period.
customer_reviews.author: Sion R. from Israel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Useful
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the ability to hear small sounds when playing games and the keenness of musical notes.Comfortable and useful. Technically, I'm not sure, because I'm not an audio expert. But, I like how these sound compared to many others I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: R. Callicotte

customer_reviews.title: Yay
customer_reviews.text: I use these mainly as an office headset and they work great in everyday use. These things last for a long time. The coushins are maybe the only bad thing about these because it seems like the material used isn't secured very well but I managed to fix it with some thread and super glue
customer_reviews.author: Jose Luis Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cool design and comfortable, but sound isn't as good as people say.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Spark

customer_reviews.title: I love it! When I saw it for the first ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! When I saw it for the first time on Amazon, I thought they looked cool. I didn't want to get my hopes up and expect too much the item. But I bought them and they're great. They're awesome!
customer_reviews.author: The Pumpkin King

customer_reviews.title: Oversold
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is not as good as the MTX unit I am currently using. Mostly treble, not as much bass as I hoped for. Disappointing, I won't use for music.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Suthers

customer_reviews.title: Its fine
customer_reviews.text: Its not bad however the paint scratches off easily. Its worth 30 dollars but I wouldn't pay more than that.
customer_reviews.author: irvin menes

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound and Bass, but Don't Use on Windy Days
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sound, only complaint is that in windy weather, I can hear the wind whistling through the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Kaykay

customer_reviews.title: Good Over-Ear Starter
customer_reviews.text: These aren't bluetooth headphones, for those wondering. They're mediocre, but they're great if you're looking for headphones that cover basic needs (music, work calls, etc.) and are pretty comfortable. I recommend for people looking to venture into over-ear headphones but don't want to commit to spending hundreds.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Ugly but excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: I can't say i love the look, but good sound quality and durability. I got these almost a year ago and they have seen some abuse. Still working great. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Games Auditor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones!
customer_reviews.text: We b have always like Skullcandy headphones and these are no exception. Very well made and the sound is truly above typical headphones. Our daughter overs them. Plus she can use them for online school due to the built in mic. Just overall great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 days
customer_reviews.text: These worked great when they first arrived. Three days later there was no sound coming out of one side so they had to go in the trash. Very disappointing and big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Greaves

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality cable, I have a toddler who removed the earcups and ripped up the foam, can't find a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these. The colors are a little off in ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. The colors are a little off in the picture but still love the way they work and feel on.
customer_reviews.author: Ganice Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality. I use a pair of Senheiser Momentum ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality. I use a pair of Senheiser Momentum Closed headphones primarily , and these come way closer than they have any business doing at this price range. Not overly bassy or weak that you'd see in a low-end headphone, and lightweight and comfortable. Zero complaints, amazing value
customer_reviews.author: Yablargo

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable, cord is too short. Sound quality is good. I would not give these as a gift or recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: A. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price - Great Bass!
customer_reviews.text: These might be the best-sounding headphones that have ever been on my head. They certainly are the best-sounding in their price range. If you like bass, then these are a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Guru

customer_reviews.title: I like these. Bass could be a little louder but ...
customer_reviews.text: I like these. Bass could be a little louder but I still like them. Good Quality. Removable cord is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Strong

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphones but only lasted a month with normal use before the head band broke. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works great my son has gone through a ton of earbuds ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great my son has gone through a ton of earbuds and headphones and none but these have lasted very long. Great product great quality
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice - Great look
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice - Great look, feel and you definitely get what you pay for! Very happy with these headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M. Munn

customer_reviews.title: Reliable headphones for a low price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a low price. The noise cancellation is not as great, can still hear what's happening around.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Garcia

customer_reviews.title: These are good headphones. I use them to train at work ...
customer_reviews.text: These are good headphones. I use them to train at work and it and although I can still hear the office nice it cancels out enough. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nybeck

customer_reviews.title: Totally Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones for the price, saw it recommended on a few product-rating websites. Great bass, fidelity, comfort.
customer_reviews.author: gatsbyslibrary

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good sound and are comfortable. Nice headphones for the price.
customer_reviews.author: K.M.C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a few months now, they last, look good, and have a good quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Ed G

product_meta.title: Skullcandy Grind On-Ear Headphones with Built-in Mic, Black and Gray
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe Grind headphone delivers everything you would expect from a premium headphone without the premium price tag: attacking bass, natural vocals, and precision highs through the powerful Rex40 driver. Full control of your music and calls with our unique TapTech feature and top of the line engineering for a great fit. With a sleek design, the best materials and your choice of colors the Grind is the ultimate hook-up.
feature_bullets: TAPTECH - A button on the outside of the ear cup lets you take calls, play or pause and switch tracks easily. Connectivity Technology: Wired
SUPREME SOUND- The Grind headphone produces attacking, powerful bass; warm, natural vocals and precision highs.
CLASSIC DESIGN - Get back to the basics with the sleek, low profile look of Grind.
FULL CONTACT COMFORT- Plush foam ear pads create a perfect seal and provide hours of listening comfort.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars961 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
